DOC.brief_summary: Emergency ultrasound examination increasingly important diagnostic tool emergency critical care medicine . This study want analyze different type education undergraduate student . Any method medical training prove theoretical clinical practice .
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective educational study want analyze different method education undergraduate medical student . Method A : Theoretical training schedule 2 hour lecture basic emergency ultrasound . After theoretical education student obtain bedside-teaching intensive care unit 4 hour . Method B : Theoretical training schedule 3 hour include lecture echocardiography , lung ultrasound abdominal ultrasound . After theoretical education student obtain bedside-teaching intensive care unit 3 hour . Method C : Theoretical training schedule 3 hour include lecture echocardiography , lung ultrasound abdominal ultrasound . After theoretical education student obtain hands-on-training healthy volunteer 3 hour . The acquire knowledge practical skill analyze multiple-choice exam ( 5 MC-questions , 5 video sequence ) practical exam ( five task ) . Any method training prove end theoretical clinical practice .
